About

This application was programmed by Dainius Jocas.

If you have a reason, then write me an email.

Source code of the app can be found at project website on GitHub.

I declare that I have no ambition to own any property rights to any of the content delivered by the www.etymonline.com website. Since I'm interested only to learn some cool stuff form the provided content, in the search results I don't show any copyright notes, only the definitions. Therefore, you don't see full webpage, including copyright notes. But copyrigt notes are provided in this "About" page -> scroll down. I hope it should be more or less OK.

To sum up, I made this application because I like etymologies and out of pure curiosity to try some nice features of Android Kitkat on my Nexus 4 device.

And don't forget to support www.etymonline.com website!

Etymonline app for Windows 8
